summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1250, for the improvement of Twenty-first Avenue North, from East Denny Way to the south line of Capitol Hill Addition, Division No. 6; Twenty-second Avenue North, from East Madison Street to East Thomas Street; Twenty-third Avenue North, from East Madison Street to East Thomas Street, East John Street, from the west line of Boston Heights Addition to East Madison Street; and East Denny Way, from East Madison Street to Twenty-first Avenue North, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete walks and other appurtenances therein under Ordinance No. 13714 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
